channel.title: Trade and Chat logs for Deltascape?
channel.description: Are there any places to find these? I could never find it on here, and chassy's tutorial and it didnt work. Can anyone point me to the tutorial or tell me how to add it?

item.title: Trade and Chat logs for Deltascape?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“Thrasher Alpha, post:3, topic:253221”][quote author=xx qwertyuiop xx link=topic=334535.msg2604336#msg2604336 date=1230445007]
Just use a BufferedWriter to write the data to a file.

try
{
    BufferedWriter bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("tradelogs.txt", true));
    bw.write("Variables such as the item traded and the amount and the players' names");
    bw.newLine();
    bw.flush();
}
catch(IOException IOE)
{
    misc.println("Error writing to trade logs!");
}
finally
{
    if(bw != null)
        bw.close();
}

[/quote]

Even if I declare that, it wont work. I have to find many other things in the client.java[/quote]
Ok, find them.
I assume you know where this goes, so you shouldn’t have any problems with it.

Read full topic
item.source: Trade and Chat logs for Deltascape?

Just use a BufferedWriter to write the data to a file.

try

    BufferedWriter bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("tradelogs.txt", true));

}
finally

    if(bw != null)
